mapper.insert: insert into member values( #{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{hobby}, default, null, default )
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, birthday = #{birthday}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, gender = #{gender}, hobby = #{hobby}, updated_at = sysdate where member_id = #{memberId}
